item.title: Automated plugin: different triggers with different actions
item.description: Side note: while writing this blog Dataverse low-code plugins are still in preview. In the Dataverse Accelarator app you get the opportunity to create plug-ins. This blogs focus on the possibilities of automated plug-ins. After selecting a table, you can choose different types of triggers: when a row is created, updated or deleted. To get information about existing records you can’t use ThisItem or ThisRecord and Set has a different behavior compared to Power Apps Canvas.
